experiences.name: Software Engineer
descriptions: Responsible for the logging and monitoring for all tokenization related products
Responsible for development of the auto rescue product
Created a robust integration test suite for all tokenization related products
Implementing new features, fixing bugs, improving maintainability, scalability and operation scalability
Interviewing of java developers including technical interviews and review of coding tests

experiences.name: Graduate Intern
descriptions: Proposed an approach that integrates monitoring signals into the development environment and worklow
Implemented a prototype of a Monitoring-Aware IDE, connected to the monitoring systems of Adyen
Improved the performance of developers by eliminating the time spent on context switching from development to monitoring environments
Presented paper publication at conference: ESEC/FSE 2019

experiences.name: Summer Research Intern
descriptions: Responsible for prototyping and researching a scalable distributed logging system to proactively prevent infrastructural failures
Implemented in c# using an advanced message queuing protocol server
Prototype was implemented successfully in a short time period and fulfilled all requirements

experiences.name: Web Developer
descriptions: Bug fixing, maintaining installations and implementing new features
Responsible for investigation of client issues
Development using primarily php with the drupal framework
